actions.description: The tin soldier makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Tin Soldier

specialTraits.description: The tin soldier is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the tin soldier must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
specialTraits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility

specialTraits.description: While the tin soldier remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.
specialTraits.name: False Appearance
